div.div: Show request's Partner as suggested recipient when sending new message via chatter.

field.name: group_request_show_stat_on_kanban_views
field.string: Show request stat on kanban views

div.div: If enabled then users will see request statistics on kanban views of request related models like: Request Type, Request Category, etc

Note: Setting the checkboxes will automatically install additional modules that provide selected functionality. Inactive checkbox means you don't have the required module in your system. You can download it from Odoo marketplace individually or as part of a bundle. Look at the Product comparison table to see which modules are included in each bundle.
